summary: An ordinance relating to the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Beacon Avenue, from 14th Avenue South, between College Street and Bayview Street, northwesterly to 10th Avenue South and Grand Street; and of 10th Avenue South, from Grand Street to Addition Street; and amending Sections 2 and 3 of Ordinance No. 65077, approved November 28, 1934.
